# pn-spinner



## Accessibility

- Spinner stroke and dot colors use `--color-primary-fg` to ensure visibility and WCAG AA contrast compliance (â‰¥ 4.5:1) in dark mode.
- A visually hidden label (`sr-only`) is provided for screen readers.

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description | Type                                | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`          | `color`           |             | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `label`          | `label`           |             | `string`                            | `'Loading'` |
| `overlay`        | `overlay`         |             | `boolean`                           | `false`     |
| `size`           | `size`            |             | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`    | `'medium'`  |
| `skeletonHeight` | `skeleton-height` |             | `string`                            | `'1rem'`    |
| `skeletonLines`  | `skeleton-lines`  |             | `number`                            | `1`         |
| `skeletonRadius` | `skeleton-radius` |             | `string`                            | `'4px'`     |
| `skeletonWidth`  | `skeleton-width`  |             | `string`                            | `'100%'`    |
| `type`           | `type`            |             | `"dots" \| "skeleton" \| "spinner"` | `'spinner'` |
